original_text: You will give birth to sons and daughters, but you will lose them. Enemies will take them away as prisoners.
korean_text: 네가 자녀를 낳을지라도 그들이 포로가 되므로 너와 함께 있지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will give birth to sons and daughters

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 그들을 잃게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Enemies will take them away as prisoners
